item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-30 Chances: LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures. The company has enlisted Oracle and Nielsen to provide brands more precise insights amid the rollout of richer ad formats. Stocks are again ripping higher after the U.
